verses.verse: "Now these are the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> which you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

"If you <S%H7069>buy<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>servant,<s%> he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> without paying <S%H2600>anything.<s%>
If he comes <S%H935>in<s%> by <S%H1610>himself,<s%> he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H1610>himself.<s%> If he is <S%H1167>married,<s%> then his <S%H802>wife<s%> shall go out with <S%H3318>him.<s%>

If his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> him a <S%H802>wife<s%> and she <S%H3205>bears<s%> him <S%H1121>sons<s%> or <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H1121>children<s%> shall be her <S%H113>master<s%>'s, and he shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H1610>himself.<s%>

But if the <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H559>plainly<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H157><s%> 'I love my <S%H113>master,<s%> my <S%H802>wife,<s%> and my <S%H1121>children.<s%> I will not go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2670>free;<s%>'

then his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> him to <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall <S%H5066>bring<s%> him to the <S%H1817>door<s%> or to the <S%H4201>doorpost,<s%> and his <S%H113>master<s%> shall <S%H7527>bore<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> through with an <S%H4836>awl,<s%> and he shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4376>sells<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to be a female <S%H519>servant,<s%> she shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> as the male <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3318>do.<s%>

If she <S%H7451>doesn't<s%> please her <S%H113>master,<s%> who has <S%H3259>married<s%> her to <S%H6299>himself,<s%> then he shall let her be redeemed. He shall have no <S%H4910>right<s%> to <S%H4376>sell<s%> her to a <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> since he has dealt deceitfully with <S%H898>her.<s%>
If he <S%H3259>marries<s%> her to his <S%H1121>son,<s%> he shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> with her <S%H4941>as<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>
If he <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> wife to <S%H1639>himself,<s%> he shall not diminish her <S%H7607>food,<s%> her <S%H3682>clothing,<s%> and her marital <S%H5772>rights.<s%>
If he <S%H6213>doesn't<s%> do these <S%H7969>three<s%> things for <S%H3318>her,<s%> she may go <S%H2600>free<s%> without paying any <S%H3701>money.<s%>
"One who <S%H5221>strikes<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> so that he <S%H4191>dies<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%>

but not if it is <S%H6658>unintentional,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H579>allows<s%> it to <S%H3027>happen:<s%> then I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> you a <S%H4725>place<s%> where he shall <S%H5127>flee.<s%>

If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6195>schemes<s%> and comes <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> on his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H3947>him,<s%> you shall take him from my <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>
"Anyone who <S%H5221>attacks<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
"Anyone who <S%H1589>kidnaps<s%> <S%H376>someone<s%> and <S%H4376>sells<s%> <S%H4672>him,<s%> or if he is found in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
"Anyone who <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

"If <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7378>quarrel<s%> and <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5221>strikes<s%> the <S%H7453>other<s%> with a <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> with his <S%H106>fist,<s%> and he <S%H4191>doesn't<s%> die, but is <S%H5307>confined<s%> to <S%H4904>bed;<s%>

if he rises <S%H6965>again<s%> and <S%H1980>walks<s%> around with his <S%H4938>staff,<s%> then he who <S%H5221>struck<s%> him shall be <S%H5414>cleared:<s%> only he shall pay for the loss of his <S%H7674>time,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>provide<s%> for his healing <S%H7674>until<s%> he is <S%H7495>thoroughly<s%> <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>strikes<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> or his <S%H519>maid<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and he <S%H4191>dies<s%> under his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> he shall <S%H5358>surely<s%> be <S%H5358>punished.<s%>
<S%H389>Notwithstanding,<s%> if he <S%H5975>gets<s%> up after a <S%H3117>day<s%> or <S%H8147>two,<s%> he shall not be <S%H5358>punished,<s%> for he is his <S%H3701>property.<s%>

"If <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5327>fight<s%> and <S%H5062>hurt<s%> a <S%H2030>pregnant<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> so that she gives <S%H3206>birth<s%> <S%H3318>prematurely,<s%> and yet no harm <S%H611>follows,<s%> he shall be <S%H6064>surely<s%> <S%H6064>fined<s%> as <S%H5414>much<s%> as the <S%H802>woman<s%>'s <S%H1167>husband<s%> <S%H7896>demands<s%> and the judges <S%H6414>allow.<s%>
But if any harm <S%H611>follows,<s%> then you must <S%H5414>take<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life,<s%>
<S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot,<s%>
<S%H3555>burning<s%> for <S%H3555>burning,<s%> <S%H6482>wound<s%> for <S%H6482>wound,<s%> and <S%H2250>bruise<s%> for <S%H2250>bruise.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5221>strikes<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H5869>eye,<s%> or his <S%H519>maid<s%>'s <S%H5869>eye,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroys<s%> <S%H7971>it,<s%> he shall let him go <S%H2670>free<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> his <S%H5869>eye<s%>'s sake.

If he <S%H5307>strikes<s%> out his male <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> or his female <S%H519>servant<s%>'s <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> he shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> for his <S%H8127>tooth<s%>'s sake.

"If a <S%H7794>bull<s%> <S%H5055>gores<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> or a <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> the <S%H7794>bull<s%> shall <S%H5619>surely<s%> be <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall not be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> but the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H7794>bull<s%> shall not be held <S%H5355>responsible.<s%>

But if the <S%H7794>bull<s%> had a habit of <S%H5056>goring<s%> in the <S%H8543>past,<s%> and it has been <S%H5749>testified<s%> to its <S%H1167>owner,<s%> and he has not <S%H8104>kept<s%> it <S%H4191>in,<s%> but it has killed a <S%H376>man<s%> or a <S%H802>woman,<s%> the <S%H7794>bull<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned,<s%> and its <S%H1167>owner<s%> shall also be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
If a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> is <S%H7896>laid<s%> on <S%H5414>him,<s%> then he shall give for the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> of his <S%H5315>life<s%> whatever is laid on <S%H7896>him.<s%>
Whether it has <S%H5055>gored<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> has <S%H5055>gored<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> according to this <S%H4941>judgment<s%> it shall be done to <S%H6213>him.<s%>

If the <S%H7794>bull<s%> <S%H5055>gores<s%> a male <S%H5650>servant<s%> or a female <S%H519>servant,<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to their <S%H113>master,<s%> and the <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H5619>stoned.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6605>opens<s%> a <S%H953>pit,<s%> or if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3738>digs<s%> a <S%H953>pit<s%> and <S%H3680>doesn't<s%> cover <S%H7794>it,<s%> and a bull or a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> falls into <S%H5307>it,<s%>
the <S%H1167>owner<s%> of the <S%H953>pit<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good.<s%> He shall <S%H7725>give<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to its <S%H1167>owner,<s%> and the dead animal shall be <S%H4191>his.<s%>

"If one <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H7794>bull<s%> <S%H5062>injures<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%>'s, so that it <S%H4191>dies,<s%> then they shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H7794>bull,<s%> and <S%H2673>divide<s%> its <S%H3701>price;<s%> and they shall also <S%H2673>divide<s%> the dead <S%H4191>animal.<s%>

Or if it is <S%H3045>known<s%> that the <S%H7794>bull<s%> was in the habit of <S%H5056>goring<s%> in the <S%H8543>past,<s%> and its <S%H1167>owner<s%> has not <S%H8104>kept<s%> it <S%H7999>in,<s%> he shall surely <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H7794>bull<s%> for <S%H7794>bull,<s%> and the dead animal shall be his <S%H4191>own.<s%>
